title.value: Экономико-энергетическая эффективность применения регуляторов роста в посадках картофеля
Economic and energy efficiency of growth regulators application in potato plantings
Economic and energy efficiency of growth regulators application in potato plantings

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Martinchik, T.N., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Application of plant growth regulators of Potejtin and Novosil on growing to plants of potato potato (Solanum tuberosum) varieties Zhuravinka and Skarb is economically more justified in comparison with Epin. It is connected by that the increase of potato yielding capacity has made 9-12 c/ha (10-16%), the profit has increased respectively on 26-37 and 62-45 mln. Belarusian rbl./hectare (35-85%), profitability level has increased on 1,0-1,5 and 2,6-1,9%, and biopower factor - on 0,2 units (6- 15%). Thus, the cost price 1 centner of production has decreased by 0,4 mln. Belarusian rbl (3-5%). Researches were spent with potato varieties Zhuravinka in 2007-2008 and Skarb - in 2009-2010 on sod-podsolic sandy soil, spread from depth 0,5-0,7 m by moraine loam Grodno State Agrarian University. The predecessor of a potato was winter rye. Experiences were pawned in 3-fold frequency with a regular arrangement of variants.
